private_key.label: Private API Key
private_key.comment: you can find at https://admin.reepay.com under "Developers" >> "API Credentials".

private_key_test.label: Private API Key For Test
private_key_test.comment: you can find at https://admin.reepay.com under "Developers" >> "API Credentials".

api_key_type.label: API Key Type
api_key_type.comment: To switch account between test account and live account.

webhook.label: Update webhook URL in Reepay
webhook.comment: Note: Save config before updating the webhook URL.

display_type.label: Display type
display_type.comment: Note: ViaBill, Vipps, Resurs Bank and Apple Pay will be opened in "Window" display type.

send_email_after_payment.label: Send order confirmation email after payment has been made

order_status.label: Order status before the payment is made

cancel_order_after_payment_cancel.label: Change order status to cancelled if the customer is redirected to the cancel_url

order_status_after_payment.label: Order status when the payment is made

payment_icons.label: Payment icons
payment_icons.comment: Payment icons which show on the checkout page.

log.label: Reepay log
log.comment: To enable Reepay log. Please make sure Magento log have been enabled.

show_icon.label: Show Klarna Direct Bank Transfer icon
